meanings.definition: A piece of absorbent material worn by a baby as underwear.
meanings.sent1: Babies wear diapers to stay dry.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy more diapers for my baby.
meanings.sent3: The diaper saved the day during the long car ride.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as comforting as a fresh diaper.
meanings.sent5: The colorful diapers brightened up the nursery.

meanings.definition: To put a diaper on a baby.
meanings.sent1: I will diaper the baby before we go out.
meanings.sent2: She quickly diapers her baby before bedtime.
meanings.sent3: Diapering the baby became a daily routine.
meanings.sent4: He diapered the baby with expert precision.
meanings.sent5: The mother gently diapered her sleeping baby.

meanings.definition: To use diapers for a baby.
meanings.sent1: Parents often diaper their babies for convenience.
meanings.sent2: We have been diapering our baby since birth.
meanings.sent3: Diapering the baby is a skill that takes practice.
meanings.sent4: She diapered the baby with care and love.
meanings.sent5: The family happily diapered their newest member.
